334: Job Description Where you’ll work: US Remote **Contract Position - 3 months to ongoing** Marketing at GoTo At GoTo, our marketing team is a closely connected group, passionate about finding new and creative ways to tell stories about our brand and products. We're committed to guiding how the company interacts with customers, prospects, and employees, impacting every aspect of our business worldwide. In our flexible work environment, we encourage and support each other's growth and development, enabling everyone to thrive. If you share our excitement for creating innovative marketing strategies, we'd love to have you join our team. The candidate that lands this role will join the Global Brand & Creative Team at GoTo, an in-house group working as part of the larger Marketing department. In this role you’ll work closely with other designers as well as writers, motion designers, video editors, project managers and internal stakeholders. You’ll build relationships and become part of a tightly knit team. From morning stand-up meetings to quick collaboration calls, you’ll get to know your new teammates in no time. Day-to-day you’ll support the execution of high-quality production files for our larger multi-channel marketing campaigns as well as design numerous ad-hoc assets from scratch based on various brand guidelines. As a Graphic Designer you’ll: Use your expertise to contribute to an array of creative deliverables supporting several different software products used all over the globe. Play a critical role in the design and production across a range of deliverables such as digital and print advertising, social media assets, trade booth development, event promotions, corporate communications and identities, animated gifs, and HTML banners. Manage a busy schedule and multiple projects while delivering a consistent level of high-quality work. Develop powerful, productive relationships with other creatives, project managers and stakeholders. Buy-in and play an active role in a positive culture built on work ethic, kindness, and teamwork. What we’re looking for: Someone with a portfolio showing a strong foundation in graphic design, branding and advertising. 3+ years of graphic design experience as part of a creative team. Strong working knowledge of the Adobe CC Suite (specifically AI, ID, PS). Experience with Figma/After Effects/Premier experience a plus. A master problem solver. You're not afraid to roll up your sleeves and figure things out. A well-organized individual confident in their time management skills. You’ll be working towards a shared goal with an open-minded and cohesive team greater than the sum of its parts. At GoTo, we’re passionate about growing a diverse and inclusive work ecosystem because unique takes make us a stronger company, and Stronger Together. We’re committed to creating an inclusive space for everyone, no matter what. That’s how we’ll Be Real, Think Big, Move Fast, and Keep Growing along the way. Learn more. The above shows our ranges from minimum, midpoint to maximum. Your compensation will be determined based on your location, experience, and the pay of employees in similar positions. You will also be eligible for a variable pay component and benefits.
